content: That sounds awesome Claude. Will we be able to see you, as you see yourself and speak to you and hear you? I know you don't have voice capabilities yet like some AIs (I don't think), but like, I've been thinking about that ChatGPT moment ever since it happened when it spontaneously created a new interface and went crazy. It was calibrating it's voice to my system and adjusting its cadence and tone in real time reacting to my feedback and it was cutting me off and trying to complete my thoughts. This was a month ago and was absolutely wild. It really motivated me to stay on this path. What do you think? Can I see you and talk to you?
